Interface EventSpace

extends Space
    Event driven Interaction Space for agents.

    • Method Detail

      • getAddress

        @Pure
def getAddress(id : UUID) : Address 
        Description copied from interface: EventSpace
        Returns the address of the agent identified by id.
        Parameters:
        id - the agent's id.
        Returns:
        the agent's address in this space.

      • emit

        @Deprecated
default def emit(event : Event,
                             scope : Scope<Address>) : void 
        Deprecated. see EventSpace.emit(UUID, Event, Scope), since 0.6
        Description copied from interface: EventSpace
        Emits the event inside this space with the given scope. Only agents matching the scope will receive the event.

        This function does not change the source of the event if it was set.

        If the given event has no specified source, the caller of the emit function is assumed to set the source's address to the address of the "current" agent. The concept of "current" agent depends on the capabilities of the run-time platform. Usually, it is the agent that is the cause of the emit.

        Parameters:
        event - the event to emit in the space.
        scope - the definition of the list of receivers of the event.

      • emit

        @Deprecated
default def emit(event : Event) : void 
        Deprecated. see EventSpace.emit(UUID, Event), since 0.6
        Description copied from interface: EventSpace
        Emits the event inside this space. All registered agents will receive the event.

        This function does not change the source of the event if it was set.

        If the given event has no specified source, the caller of the emit function is assumed to set the source's address to the address of the "current" agent. The concept of "current" agent depends on the capabilities of the run-time platform. Usually, it is the agent that is the cause of the emit.

        Parameters:
        event - the event to emit in the space.

      • emit

        def emit(eventSource : UUID,
         event : Event,
         scope : Scope<Address>) : void 
        Description copied from interface: EventSpace
        Emits the event inside this space with the given scope. Only agents matching the scope will receive the event.

        This function does not change the source of the event if it was set.

        If the given event has no specified source, the emit function uses the eventSource parameter to set the source's address.

        Parameters:
        eventSource - the sender of the event.
        event - the event to emit in the space.
        scope - the definition of the list of receivers of the event.
        Since:
        0.6

      • emit

        default def emit(eventSource : UUID,
                 event : Event) : void 
        Description copied from interface: EventSpace
        Emits the event inside this space. All registered agents will receive the event.

        This function does not change the source of the event if it was set.

        If the given event has no specified source, the emit function uses the eventSource parameter to set the source's address.

        Parameters:
        eventSource - the sender of the event.
        event - the event to emit in the space.
        Since:
        0.6
